name: Wizard Dungeon
description:
Currently a work in progress for a BreakOut style game.  10 levels and only one life for the played.

Some area's I am still working on include:

Wizard (paddle) I need to update the art.

Currently no music.

The fireball sometimes slows down when hitting multiple objects at once.

One set of score for all chests.

New game objects to break ( I am thinking a barrel(s), pots, crates, sacks, and enemies(?).

Audio is just me messing with microphone - this for sure can be updated.

More levels.
